meanings.definition: A person who is easily annoyed or angered.
meanings.sent1: My sister is always a grumps when she doesn't get enough sleep.
meanings.sent2: The grumps at the store complained about the long line.
meanings.sent3: The grumps in the office always grumble about the air conditioning.
meanings.sent4: The old man down the street is a real grumps, never smiling at anyone.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the grumps in the morning, they are not morning people.

meanings.definition: To be in a bad mood or irritable.
meanings.sent1: I grumps whenever I have to wake up early for work.
meanings.sent2: She grumps every time her favorite show is interrupted by commercials.
meanings.sent3: The cat grumps when it doesn't get its favorite treats.
meanings.sent4: The toddler grumps when it's time for bed and doesn't want to sleep.
meanings.sent5: Don't grumps at me just because you had a bad day.
